snippet.title: Trover Saves the Universe PAX Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
COMING TO PS4 AND PSVR EARLY 2019
MORE INFO:  http://troversavestheuniverse.com
Wonderful. Your dogs have been dognapped by a beaked lunatic who stuffed them into his eye holes and is using their life essence to destroy the universe. You’ve partnered with Trover, a purple eye hole monster to save them. Find cute little monsters called power babies, and plug them into his eye holes so that he can absorb their power, track down Glorkon, and save your dogs (and the Universe). 

It’s an action platformer buddy comedy where you get to control Trover AND yourself in a strange mix of first and third person action. Explore bizarre alien worlds and characters along your journey.
